D

DFlipFlop - class model.DFlipFlop.
DFlipFlopGate extends the abstract class LogicComponent, implementing the logic required to simulate a D Flip-Flop.
DFlipFlop(Model) - Constructor for class model.DFlipFlop
Constructs a solitary new DFlipFlopGate object.
DFlipFlopImage - class gui.DFlipFlopImage.
DFlipFlopImage extends the abstract class ComponentImage, and is the gui counterpart to DFlipFlop.
DFlipFlopImage() - Constructor for class gui.DFlipFlopImage
Constructs a new instance of DFlipFlopImage, used by the toybox.
DFlipFlopImage(Gui, Point) - Constructor for class gui.DFlipFlopImage
Constructs a new instance of DFlipFlopImage with a given location in the sandbox.
DeleteSelection - class controller.DeleteSelection.
Implements the actions for deleting all objects selected in the gui.
DeleteSelection(Gui, Model, ArrayList) - Constructor for class controller.DeleteSelection
Constructs a new DeleteSelection command.
Displayable - class gui.Displayable.
Displayable is the superclass of all logic components, input/ output pins, wires, and wire nodes.
Displayable(Gui, Point) - Constructor for class gui.Displayable
Constructs a new Displayable object.
deleteSelection(ArrayList) - Method in class controller.Controller
Creates a DeleteSelection object and executes it.
description - Variable in class controller.Command
a brief description of the command
disconnectComponents(Wire) - Method in class model.Model
Disconnects a visual connection between two components.
disconnectFromInput(int) - Method in class model.CustomComponent
Overrides LogicComponent.disconnectFromInput(int).
disconnectFromInput(int) - Method in class model.LogicComponent
Breaks the connection from a given input pin on this component to another LogicComponent.
disconnectFromOutput(int, LogicComponent, int) - Method in class model.CustomComponent
Overrides LogicComponent.disconnectFromOutput(int, LogicComponent, int).
disconnectFromOutput(int, LogicComponent, int) - Method in class model.LogicComponent
Breaks the connection from a given output pin on this component to another LogicComponent.
displayableMouseDragged(MouseEvent) - Method in class gui.Displayable
Handles mouseDragged events for the Displayable.
displayableMousePressed(MouseEvent) - Method in class gui.Displayable
Handles mousePressed events for the Displayable.
displayableMouseReleased(MouseEvent) - Method in class gui.Displayable
Handles mouseReleased events for the Displayable.
